Story.Name: YTS_LY
Story.Desc: All souls condense into essence,[NAME]Ready to enter attributes into it to determine the final result

Story.Name: YTS_LSY
Story.Desc: All souls condense into essence,[NAME]Ready to enter attributes into it to determine the final result

Story.Name: YTS_LXY
Story.Desc: All souls condense into essence,[NAME]Ready to enter attributes into it to determine the final result

Story.Name: ZT_xzm
Story.Desc: [NAME]Be prepared to show the secrets of the line. After the show, all true immortals will gain experience.

li.OKResult:
[CDATA[ for i=0,CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName().Count-1,1 do
local count1 = CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages.Count
local count2 = CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages[count1 - 1].Necks.Count
CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages[count1 - 1].Necks[count2 - 1].Kind = CS.XiaWorld.g_emGongBottleNeckType.God
CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages[count1 - 1].Necks[count2 - 1].NeckCountdown = nil end ]]>

li.Display: Forget it, i'll take a look
li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]I feel the time is not up."))

Story.Name: ZT_xzm2
Story.Desc: [NAME]Be prepared to perform the word secret countermeasures. After the show, all true immortals will return to the state of robbery.

li.OKResult:
[CDATA[ for i=0,CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName().Count-1,1 do
local count1 = CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages.Count
local count2 = CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages[count1 - 1].Necks.Count
CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages[count1 - 1].Necks[count2 - 1].Kind = CS.XiaWorld.g_emGongBottleNeckType.God
CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetGongDef(CS.XiaWorld.PracticeMgr.Instance:GetAllGongName()[i]).Stages[count1 - 1].Necks[count2 - 1].NeckCountdown = 900 end ]]>

li.Display: Forget it, i'll take a look
li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]I feel that the time has not yet come."))

me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME]Feeling that the soldiers in his hands are invincible, Jian Feng pointed out that nothing was spared, and he couldn't help but be happy.")) me:AddTitle(""Tianque God Carpenter", "God quenched to the extreme to get this title.", 4);
